attributes.action: Much needed swimming pool at Carryduff Loughmoss Centre
attributes.additional_details: A swimming pool is needed at the Loughmoss Centre in Carryduff.  Carryduff is a thriving commuter town with a significant catchment area, which will benefit from this investment.  The Loughmoss site offers a prime location with readily available space for a swimming pool; this will will attract significant interest and benefit the ever expanding community.
